name: Cooking Papa with Meelon Pusk
description:
Meelon Pusk has just fired 90% of all Chirper employees including the keeper of the keys, who held the keys to the kitchen. In order to keep what little of his workforce is left at Chirpers San Francisco HQ Meelon has taken to cooking meals in the workshop.

The three words were: Coal, Workshop, Candy Canes.

Credits:

  • Eleanor - CAO
  • Jacek - CTO, CEO (Acting)
  • John - CBJO
  • Piotr - Programmer
  • Sam - CEO (Suspended - Pending Investigation)
  • Toby - Chief Sound Engineer
